name: Gary the Gull
description: Say hi to Gary! Gary the Gull is an VR Animated Interactive Short Film where you are part of the story! Respond to Gary's questions -- nodding, shaking your head, talking -- and see how your decisions affect how the story plays out.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or AMD 290 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Network Connection Required
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Intel i7-4790k Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or AMD 390 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Network Connection Required (wired cable recommended)

reviews.review_text: If they charged for this game I would have given it a negative review because it's so short.  That being said, I don't understand peoples negative reviews. It's a fun little interactive video short that is a great first game someone should have into VR. Even if you have multiple games, it's just for laughs and it's decent with it's short story line.  I'd reccomened it being free, and it does have good tongue in cheek humor.
2/5 on interesting level, very short but free. Liked the voices and the idea but first game to ever crash my system completely. Can't recommend.
